content_sections.content:
Example Convert "Hello World!" to hexadecimal values: Definition and Usage The bin2hex() function converts a string of ASCII characters to hexadecimal values. The string can be converted back using the pack() function. Syntax bin2hex( string ) Parameter Values Parameter Description string Required. The string to be converted Technical Details Return Value: Returns the hexadecimal value of the converted string PHP Version: 4+ More Examples Example Convert a string value from binary to hex and back: "; echo pack("H*",bin2hex($str)) . "
